channel.title: Comments on: Eddie Van-Halen’s revisionist history

item.title: By: Michael Anthony is way classier than Eddie Van-Halen
item.dc:creator: Michael Anthony is way classier than Eddie Van-Halen
item.description: [...] weeks of silence, as Eddie Van-Halen has literally tried to remove his very existence from every facet of Van-Halen’s illustrious history, bassist Michael Anthony has finally [...]
